Lauderhill.Boyd H. Anderson High School: Boyd H. Anderson High School (also called "Boyd Anderson", or "B.A.", located in Lauderdale Lakes, Florida) is an suburban high school in Broward County. Boyd H. Anderson serves Lauderdale Lakes, and parts of Tamarac, North Lauderdale, Oakland Park, Fort Lauderdale and Lauderhill. Boyd H. Anderson High School is located in Lauderdale Lakes, Florida.
